scripts.version: babel src/ngine.js > build/ngine.es2015.js && echo 'window.$ngine.version = "'$npm_package_version'";' >> build/ngine.es2015.js && uglifyjs -c -m -p bare_returns build/ngine.es2015.js > build/tmp.js && echo '/*! Ngine '$npm_package_version' | (c) Christian Westman | GNU General Public License v3.0 | https://nginejs.com */' > build/ngine.min.$npm_package_version.js && cat build/tmp.js >> build/ngine.min.$npm_package_version.js && rm build/tmp.js && echo $npm_package_version >> versions
